title: One Friday: four weeks to go, Andy Altmann joins line-up
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235220/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 27.Jan.2006 8.54am 

\\

Four weeks to go

There are just four weeks to go until One Friday,  
 24 February 2006. If you haven’t already booked,  
 then now is the time to do so as the schedule for  
 the event is full.

Final speaker

Andy Altmann of Why Not Associates is the final speaker  
 at the conference (Andy’s session will replace the  
 previously scheduled panel session). Why Not is a small,  
 energetic consultancy with almost two decades of  
 experience to back it - clients include Nike, First  
 Direct, Virgin Records and the BBC. The company’s work  
 has featured in two volumes: Why Not Associates (?)  
 (1998, Booth Clibborn Editions) and Why Not Associates (?2)  
 (2004, Thames & Hudson), it has also featured in  
 exhibitions and press articles world wide.

Full line-up

The full list of speakers for the event is as follows:

Andy Altmann - Why Not Associates  
 Jonathan Barnbrook - Barnbrook/Virus  
 Rian Hughes - Device  
 Morag Myerscough - Studio Myerscough/Her House  
 Geoff Nicol - Navyblue  
 Erik Spiekermann - United Designers

Conference information

For more information about the conference visit the  
 conference web site at:

[http://www.onefriday.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235220/http:/www.onefriday.co.uk/ "http://www.onefriday.co.uk")

Online registration

To register for One Friday online, visit the secure  
 booking site:

[http://secure.indx.co.uk/onefriday/shop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235220/http:/secure.indx.co.uk/onefriday/shop/ "http://secure.indx.co.uk/onefriday/shop/")

\\
author: Miss Tiffany
